processingCommand.statement:
select  count(persid) nr_rec from (
SELECT to_char(data_ref, 'yyyymmdd') data_contab, persid, pack_type_id pachet_tipid, CASE WHEN turnover_type = 'CR' THEN cr_turnover ELSE db_turnover END rulaj
FROM (SELECT data_ref, persid, customer_id, pack_type_id, account_id,
             CASE WHEN db_turnover_ref IS NOT NULL AND cr_turnover_ref IS NULL THEN 'DB'
                  WHEN db_turnover_ref IS NULL AND cr_turnover_ref IS NOT NULL THEN 'CR'
             END turnover_type, db_turnover, cr_turnover 
      FROM dvhcardpro.dvh_cmp_monthly_turnover 
      WHERE ((db_turnover IS NOT NULL AND db_turnover>=db_turnover_ref) OR (cr_turnover IS NOT NULL AND cr_turnover>=cr_turnover_ref))))
   WHERE data_contab='${DateMod("${lastWorkingDay}")}'
